verses.verse: Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto me, Though Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, yet my mind <S%H5315><s%> could not be toward this people <S%H5971><s%>: cast them out <S%H7971><s%> of my sight <S%H6440><s%>, and let them go forth <S%H3318><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they say <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Whither shall we go forth <S%H3318><s%>? then thou shalt tell <S%H559><s%> them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; Such as are for death <S%H4194><s%>, to death <S%H4194><s%>; and such as are for the sword <S%H2719><s%>, to the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and such as are for the famine <S%H7458><s%>, to the famine <S%H7458><s%>; and such as are for the captivity <S%H7628><s%>, to the captivity <S%H7628><s%>.

And I will appoint <S%H6485><s%> over them four <S%H702><s%> kinds <S%H4940><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: the sword <S%H2719><s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%>, and the dogs <S%H3611><s%> to tear <S%H5498><s%>, and the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, to devour <S%H398><s%> and destroy <S%H7843><s%>.

And I will cause <S%H5414><s%> them to be removed <S%H2189><s%> <S%H2113><s%> into all kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, because <S%H1558><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, for that which he did <S%H6213><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

For who shall have pity <S%H2550><s%> upon thee, O Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>? or who shall bemoan <S%H5110><s%> thee? or who shall go aside <S%H5493><s%> to ask <S%H7592><s%> how thou doest <S%H7965><s%>?

Thou hast forsaken <S%H5203><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thou art gone <S%H3212><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>: therefore will I stretch out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against thee, and destroy <S%H7843><s%> thee; I am weary <S%H3811><s%> with repenting <S%H5162><s%>.

And I will fan <S%H2219><s%> them with a fan <S%H4214><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; I will bereave <S%H7921><s%> them of children, I will destroy <S%H6><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>, since they return <S%H7725><s%> not from their ways <S%H1870><s%>.

Their widows <S%H490><s%> are increased <S%H6105><s%> to me above the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>: I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon them against the mother <S%H517><s%> of the young men <S%H970><s%> a spoiler <S%H7703><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>: I have caused him to fall <S%H5307><s%> upon it suddenly <S%H6597><s%>, and terrors <S%H928><s%> upon the city <S%H5892><s%>.

She that hath borne <S%H3205><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> languisheth <S%H535><s%>: she hath given up <S%H5301><s%> the ghost <S%H5315><s%>; her sun <S%H8121><s%> is gone <S%H935><s%> down while it was yet day <S%H3119><s%> <S%H3117><s%>: she hath been ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%>: and the residue <S%H7611><s%> of them will I deliver <S%H5414><s%> to the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

¶ Woe <S%H188><s%> is me, my mother <S%H517><s%>, that thou hast borne <S%H3205><s%> me a man <S%H376><s%> of strife <S%H7379><s%> and a man <S%H376><s%> of contention <S%H4066><s%> to the whole earth <S%H776><s%>! I have neither lent on usury <S%H5383><s%>, nor men have lent to me on usury <S%H5383><s%>; yet every one of them doth curse <S%H7043><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Verily <S%H3808><s%> <S%H518><s%> it shall be well <S%H2896><s%> with thy remnant <S%H8281><s%> <S%H8293><s%>; verily <S%H518><s%> I will cause the enemy <S%H341><s%> to entreat <S%H6293><s%> thee well in the time <S%H6256><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> and in the time <S%H6256><s%> of affliction <S%H6869><s%>.
Shall iron <S%H1270><s%> break <S%H7489><s%> the northern <S%H6828><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%> and the steel <S%H5178><s%>?

Thy substance <S%H2428><s%> and thy treasures <S%H214><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> to the spoil <S%H957><s%> without price <S%H4242><s%>, and that for all thy sins <S%H2403><s%>, even in all thy borders <S%H1366><s%>.

And I will make thee to pass <S%H5674><s%> with thine enemies <S%H341><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not: for a fire <S%H784><s%> is kindled <S%H6919><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, which shall burn <S%H3344><s%> upon you.

¶ O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>: remember <S%H2142><s%> me, and visit <S%H6485><s%> me, and revenge <S%H5358><s%> me of my persecutors <S%H7291><s%>; take me not away <S%H3947><s%> in thy longsuffering <S%H639><s%> <S%H750><s%>: know <S%H3045><s%> that for thy sake I have suffered <S%H5375><s%> rebuke <S%H2781><s%>.

Thy words <S%H1697><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%>, and I did eat <S%H398><s%> them; and thy word <S%H1697><s%> was unto me the joy <S%H8342><s%> and rejoicing <S%H8057><s%> of mine heart <S%H3824><s%>: for I am called <S%H7121><s%> by thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

I sat <S%H3427><s%> not in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the mockers <S%H7832><s%>, nor rejoiced <S%H5937><s%>; I sat <S%H3427><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>: for thou hast filled <S%H4390><s%> me with indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

Why is my pain <S%H3511><s%> perpetual <S%H5331><s%>, and my wound <S%H4347><s%> incurable <S%H605><s%>, which refuseth <S%H3985><s%> to be healed <S%H7495><s%>? wilt thou be altogether unto me as a liar <S%H391><s%>, and as waters <S%H4325><s%> that fail <S%H539><s%>?

¶ Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, If thou return <S%H7725><s%>, then will I bring thee again <S%H7725><s%>, and thou shalt stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me: and if thou take forth <S%H3318><s%> the precious <S%H3368><s%> from the vile <S%H2151><s%>, thou shalt be as my mouth <S%H6310><s%>: let them return <S%H7725><s%> unto thee; but return <S%H7725><s%> not thou unto them.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee unto this people <S%H5971><s%> a fenced <S%H1219><s%> brasen <S%H5178><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%>: and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against thee, but they shall not prevail <S%H3201><s%> against thee: for I am with thee to save <S%H3467><s%> thee and to deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
And I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>, and I will redeem <S%H6299><s%> thee out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the terrible <S%H6184><s%>.
